ability.name: A Mistake Will Soon Be Corrected
ability.description: * Play any five-card straight on A Mistake Will Soon Be Corrected. * These cards must all be played at the same time. * Sum the cards's values: deal half that much Magic Damage, rounded down, to all Adversaries in your Zone. * Discard all cards on A Mistake Will Soon Be Corrected. * If the five cards are not all in the same suit, take 1 Corruption Point and deal 1HP of Magic Damage to yourself and any allies in your Zone. * If the five cards are all Major Arcana, deal full Magic Damage rather than half.
ability.flavor: Never draw to an inside straight, and, more importantly, never stand near a High Priestess when they're focusing.
